_comment_start: RESONANT · SPONSOR METRICS EXPORT — v1.0 | Aggregated · Pitch-safe · Sponsor-ready

meta.description: High-level sponsor metrics focused on audience attention, listening depth, and consistency, derived exclusively from intentional listening sessions.

methodology.attentionDefinition: Listening sessions of 15 minutes or more are considered meaningful attention.
methodology.audienceQualityDefinition: Audience quality is classified using retention rate thresholds.
methodology.listeningDepthDefinition: Listening depth reflects average session duration.
methodology.scoringModel: Signal strength is a weighted combination of retention, depth, and peak concurrency.
methodology.aggregationLevel: Collective behavior only; no listener- or device-level data.

notes: This file contains no executable logic.
All metrics are aggregated locally from intentional sessions only.
Designed for sponsor evaluation, media planning, and pitch decks.
Safe for sharing with brands, agencies, and partners.
_comment_end: END OF FILE — RESONANT SPONSOR METRICS · FREEZE LOCKED
